channel.title: [508] Changing Max Stat Level [508] Rep++
channel.description:
Well im gonna mess around with a 508 for abit and see what i can figure out.
The current base im using has the max stats set to 120, and i wanna bring them down too 99. Anyone know how too do this?

The current base im using has the max stats set to 120, and i wanna bring them down too 99. Anyone know how too do this?[/quote]

Probably by going into the server, finding where the level is calculated, and returning 99 instead of 120.
